title: Nanase Ren
synopsis: This will appear to be a very disturbing animation to most. Designs by Murakami Teruaki, published by Soft by Demand (Anime), and based on the eroge by M no Violet.
staff: [['Murakami, Teruaki', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation', ' Character Design', ' Animation Director']], ['Yatabe, Katsuyoshi', ['Sound Director', ' Production Coordination']], ['Nozaki, Hiroki', ['Sound Effects']], ['M no Violet', ['Original Creator']]]
